GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
x86/kprobes: Update kcb status flag after singlestepping

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 663cdda2716b70751df9c7e60b81bd0850fdfe3c, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 6256e668b7af9d81472e03c6a171630c08f8858a. For more details please see the references link.
